msg: Revert r1667314. I discovered I need this for the fix for BZ 57708

author: deepak
msg: Fixed OrderItemBilling cache warning, never-cache is set to true for OrderItemBilling, hence it will never put in cache. Set cache false while fetching the order item billing record in OrderReadHelper.getOrderPaymentReceivedTotalByType method.

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed a bug in screenlet widget:  If there is no Screenlet's preferenceKey in requestParameters, the initially-collapsed always be false. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6172
